MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the LL24 postcode area of Betws Y Coed, affecting properties in Pentre Foelaf and surrounding areas. Our engineers are needing to re-interrupt supplies, this is due to a faulty transformer which we now need to replace and we expect power to be back on by 7:45PM.  We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:55PM on 16th October 2020.
